IMAGE: Australia's ability to quickly reset, rebound and ultimately dominate was on display again in India where they sealed the series with a 21-run win in Chennai on Wednesday. Photograph: BCCI

articles.title: A look at Mumbai Indians' strongest possible XI for IPL 2023 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India's all-format captain Rohit Sharma will lead the batting charge of the Mumbai Indians (MI) at IPL 2023. MI suffered a massive blow ahead of the IPL as pace ace Jasprit Bumrah was ruled out of the entire season. England pacer Jofra Archer will be leading …
